DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History Photosensitivity Or Porphyria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether or not an individual has a history of porphyria or other diseases exacerbated by light.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History Photosensitivity Or Porphyria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced._Increased sensitivity of the skin to light._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A group of genetic or acquired metabolic disorders characterized by defects in the enzymes that are involved in the heme synthesis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: Increased sensitivity of the skin to light.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A group of genetic or acquired metabolic disorders characterized by defects in the enzymes that are involved in the heme synthesis.

Concepts.definition: Increased sensitivity of the skin to light exposure.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A group of genetic or acquired metabolic disorders characterized by defects in the enzymes that are involved in the heme synthesis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
